mapper.select: select from test_user where id = #{id} limit 1
mapper.insert:
insert into test_user
id, username, password, nickname, phone, del_flag, email, created, updated,
#{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{delFlag}, #{email}, #{created}, #{updated},
mapper.update: update test_user set status = '1' where id = #{id}
